name: burjo-accounting-backend
description: Backend API for Burjo Accounting System

scripts.migrate: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('psql -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-burjo_accounting} -f migrations/001_create_users_table.sql && psql -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-burjo_accounting} -f migrations/002_create_chart_of_accounts.sql && psql -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-burjo_accounting} -f migrations/003_create_transactions.sql && psql -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-burjo_accounting} -f migrations/004_create_journal_entries.sql && psql -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-burjo_accounting} -f migrations/005_create_inventory.sql && psql -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-burjo_accounting} -f migrations/006_create_audit_logs.sql && psql -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-burjo_accounting} -f migrations/007_insert_sample_data.sql', {stdio: 'inherit'})"

author: Burjo Team
